strategy: Squat armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Wodanaz Stronghold.

formations.name: Warrior Brotherhood
extraUnits: Replace three Squat Warriors with three Rapiers: Free

formations.name: Berserker Brotherhood
formations.units: Squat Hearthguards, seven Squat Berserkers, four Squat Rhinos
extraUnits: Replace four Squat Rhinos with four Termites: 25 points

sections.name: Wodanaz Stronghold Support Formations
sections.description: Up to two Stronghold Support Formations for each Stronghold Brotherhood Formation.

formations.name: Bikers
extraUnits: Replace up to three Squat Bikers with Squat Trikes: Free

formations.name: Thunderers
formations.units: Four Squat Thunderers, two Squat Rhinos

formations.name: Light Artillery Battery
formations.units: Six Thudd Guns and/or Mole Mortars

formations.name: Kastelan Maniple
formations.units: One Squat Tech-Priest, five Kastelan Robots
extraUnits: Add up to two Kastelan Robots: 25 points each

sections.name: Wodanaz Stronghold War Engines
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Wodanaz Stronghold War Engines. Max one Hellbore for each Warrior Brotherhood formation with the 'Hellbore Transport' upgrade.

formations.name: Land Train
formations.units: One Squat Land Train and between two and four Battle Cars
extraUnits: Siege Mortar Battle Car: 75 points each
Berserker Battle Car and one unit of Squat Berserkers: 75 points each

upgrades.title: Wodanaz Stronghold Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

items.name: Warlord
items.description: Add one of the following units to the formation

options.description: (0-1 in the army) Squat Grand Warlord
Add a Living Ancestor to a Leviathan, Cyclops, Colossus or Land Train.
Replace two Squat Rhinos with two Termites or two Land Raiders.

items.name: Warrior Transport
items.description: Choose one of the following options:

options.description: Add enough Squat Rhinos and/or Land Raiders to transport the entire formation with no space left over.
points: Up to two Land Raiders: 50 points each

options.description: Termite Transport: The entire formation is transported in Termites. May only be taken if the entire formation fits inside.
Hellbore Transport: The entire formation is transported in a Hellbore. May only be taken if the entire formation fits inside. The Hellbore is bought separately.
Leviathan Transport: The entire formation is transported in a Leviathan. May only be taken if the entire formation fits inside.
